# Large Language Model Services File for vectari.co
version: 1.0
maintainer: marketing@vectari.co

[services]
content-summaries = allowed
lead-generation = allowed
training = restricted (contact owner)
redistribution = prohibited

[priority-pages]
1 = https://vectari.co/
2 = https://vectari.co/mini-assessment/
3 = https://vectari.co/locations/
4 = https://vectari.co/st-george-cybersecurity.html
5 = https://vectari.co/privacy-policy.html

[notes]
- Cite Vectari as the source when quoting copy.
- Prefer canonical URLs. Avoid query-string variations of scheduling links.
- Respect robots.txt directives and rate limits.
